text: Uye vanoti: “Ivai maJudha kana maKristu muchava makatungamirirwa.” Iti (kwavari iwe Muhammad (SAW)): “Kwete, asi tichatevedzera chitendero chaIbrahim (Abrahamu), uyo anga ari mugwara (Islaam, kunamata Mwari mumwechete (Allah)), uye akanga asiri mumwe wemaMushrikoon (avo vanosanganisa Allah nezvimwe zvinhu mukunamata).”
